CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_landing', false, 'tZyOKbtBW1Y6jgOgyl3rm-ghuJUJsbLCHIgBPzIXDfk', 'v3.5.0--KuwV-nvqmNHxs0euW2GFqjhHUZgfhieAW1iG6hjMUJA', 'Y2Xb-_F3ZyHGYXtT-zhJHsL9w4Si2jqh-N8r9reXN7A'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_landing; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_landing (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_landing VALUES ('landing/index.md', '', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["u-page-hero",{"className":["dark:bg-gradient-to-b","from-neutral-900","to-neutral-950","titlebg"],"orientation":"horizontal"},["template",{"v-slot:top":""},["hero-background",{}]],["template",{"v-slot:title":""},["p",{},"뭐든 해드리는 ",["br",{}],["span",{"className":["text-primary"]},"커미션 샘플 페이지"],"."]],["template",{"v-slot:description":""},["p",{},"안녕하세요, 이곳은 연이나의 커미션 작업물 및 샘플을 전시하는 곳입니다. 커미션 신청 시 참고 바랍니다."],["p",{},"이 사이트는 nuxt의 템플릿을 이용하여 직접 만들었으나, 웹사이트 관련 커미션은 받지 않습니다. 음악과 일러스트 약간만 취급합니다."]],["template",{"v-slot:links":""},["u-button",{"size":"xl","to":"/getting-started","trailing-icon":"i-lucide-arrow-right"},["p",{},"대문 바로가기"]],["u-button",{"size":"xl","to":"https://crepe.cm/@however_ina","color":"neutral","icon":"i-simple-icons-github","target":"_blank","variant":"outline"},["p",{},"크레페 구경하기"]]],["p",{},["img",{"alt":"","src":"/images/ina.png"}]]]],"toc":{"title":"","searchDepth":1,"depth":2,"links":[]}}', '', 'md', '{}', 'true', '/', '{"title":"연이나 커미션 페이지","description":"느긋하게 게임을 진행하는 유저가 플레이 중 알게 된 정보를 바탕으로 작성하는 위키"}', 'index', '939t77NNG4MiVFltwNRzNOy8SLNRgJmYpANAG7RjdEg'); -- 939t77NNG4MiVFltwNRzNOy8SLNRgJmYpANAG7RjdEg
UPDATE _content_info SET ready = true WHERE id = 'checksum_landing'; -- meta
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_docs', false, '34VO9dvAPvtpqIagDKzbpgcpKTSRhud0mLOnSKb5i1E', 'v3.5.0--6bgZTGkfnBa2zclD8qhgwJW8IHUc1JbUKDU5XI3rq1A', 'QDsntmyuPTwWjHqMAvROkHQDo_9rJWhuxf7juQi0Tzc'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_docs; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_docs (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "links" TEXT NULL, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
